title: Argentina Used Multilateral Funds to Repay $2.5 Billion US Swap
description: Argentina secured financing from an unnamed multilateral institution to repay $2.5 billion to the US Treasury from a currency swap agreement, according to an official from the nation’s central bank.
content: Argentina secured financing from an unnamed multilateral institution to repay $2.5 billion to the US Treasury from a currency swap agreement, according to an official from the nation’s central bank.
